thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Customer Mr Gerald FALVEY
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Customer Mr Gerald FALVEY

author: Customer Mr Gerald FALVEY
title: Customer Mr Gerald FALVEY
text: The staff at Omega were professional and polite with answers to all our questions. The car supplied was old but well maintained and an automatic, which is the preferred type for New Zealand. The drop off/pick-up location was near the port in Auckland and ideal for our needs as we had to join a cruise on the last day of hire.
